How can I add comments in Django templates? I am trying to add a comment to a line of code in my Django template, but I'm not sure about the correct syntax. Here is an example of what I'm trying to do:

```Django
{% # this is a comment %}
{% if something.property %}
    <table>
        <tr>...
```

In Django templates, you can add comments using the `{% comment %}` tag. This tag allows you to include comments that will not be rendered in the final HTML output. Here's how you can add a comment in your template:

```Django
{% comment %}
    This is a comment.
{% endcomment %}
{% if something.property %}
    <table>
        <tr>...
```

Alternatively, you can use `{# ... #}` for inline comments:

```Django
{% if something.property %}
    {# This is an inline comment #}
    <table>
        <tr>...
```

Both methods will ensure that the comments are not included in the rendered HTML. Use whichever method fits your needs best.
